Title: Red Museum
Plot: While investigating the connection between the abduction of several teenagers and a rural religious cult, Mulder and Scully discover a secret test being performed on the children using the "Purity Control" alien DNA from 'The Erlenmeyer Flask' which leads Mulder to "the crew-cut man", Deep Throat's murderer.
GuestStars: Gillian Barber, Bob Frazer, Robert Clothier, Elisabeth Rosen, Cameron Labine, Tony Sampson, Crystal Verge, Gerry Nairn, Brian McGugan, Paul Sand, Steve Eastin, Mark Rolston, Lindsey Ginter
